Parameter.name: userRules
Parameter.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><rules version="1.0"> <default colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture"/> <FilePathRule name="raw_exr" extension="exr" pattern="*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="hdri" extension="hdr" pattern="*" colorSpace="Utility - Linear - sRGB" /> <FilePathRule name="subtance_Height" extension="png" pattern="*Height*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="substance_Rougness" extension="png" pattern="*Roughness*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="substance_Metalness" extension="png" pattern="*Metalness*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="substance_Normal" extension="png" pattern="*Normal*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="speedTree_subAmount" extension="png" pattern="*SubsurfaceAmount" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="speedTree_opacity" extension="png" pattern="*Opacity" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="speedTree_Gloss" extension="png" pattern="*Gloss" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="displaceTif" extension="tif" pattern="*displace*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /></rules>
